text: VersionEye - Berlin - http://www.versioneye.com We are a tech company from Berlin, working with Ruby on Rails, JavaScript and MongoDB. Currently we are looking for a freelance designer who can create some awesome badges. We want to have different badges for the status of open source libraries. For more details send and email to contact@versioneye.com or contact us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/VersionEye
